devdoc.details: DDO stands for Decentralized Document. It allows publishers     to publish their dataset metadata in decentralized way.     It follows the Ocean DID Document standard:      https://github.com/oceanprotocol/OEPs/blob/master/7/v0.2/README.md

create(bytes32,bytes,bytes).details: create     creates/publishes new DDO document on-chain.

transferOwnership(bytes32,address).details: transferOwnership     allows only did owners to transfer did ownership

update(bytes32,bytes,bytes).details: update     allows only did owners to update the DDO/metadata content

devdoc.title: DDO
